name: Mitigation Playbook for PowerShell Script Execution Incident
description: Mitigation playbook for an incident where an adversary leveraged a PowerShell script for unauthorized access and data exfiltration.

if-condition--2cfc59e6-d0c2-452e-879e-e3.name: Check if unauthorized PowerShell process is running

action--4edc4a6b-6751-4e02-bab5-4850e6a9.name: Terminate unauthorized PowerShell process
action--4edc4a6b-6751-4e02-bab5-4850e6a9.description: Stops the unauthorized PowerShell process that was executing scripts.

action--bf7763c4-552e-444a-a0e2-3ee679b4.name: Isolate the affected host from the network
action--bf7763c4-552e-444a-a0e2-3ee679b4.description: Disables network access for the compromised host to prevent further exfiltration.

action--bde4d0b7-57bc-45a2-9b31-26b67438.name: Conduct a forensic scan to identify persistence mechanisms
action--bde4d0b7-57bc-45a2-9b31-26b67438.description: Runs a forensic scan to check for any persistent threats on the system.

while-condition--be4fd073-d16f-420f-8fbb.name: ForensicScanLoop
while-condition--be4fd073-d16f-420f-8fbb.description: Checks if the forensic scan is clean.

action--dd574c58-2b9a-4f8a-ae5e-0251f5b2.name: Update endpoint protection with latest definitions
action--dd574c58-2b9a-4f8a-ae5e-0251f5b2.description: Updates the antivirus definitions to ensure protection against known threats.

action--7b0b3120-bb45-42c6-af1b-500b403c.name: Reset credentials for all affected accounts
action--7b0b3120-bb45-42c6-af1b-500b403c.description: Resets access credentials for users who may have been compromised.
